# 平头哥教你一天上手蓝牙Mesh应用方案

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/pingtou-gejiao-ni-yitian-shang-shou-lanya-mesh-yingyong-fangan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/pingtou-gejiao-ni-yitian-shang-shou-lanya-mesh-yingyong-fangan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install pingtou-gejiao-ni-yitian-shang-shou-lanya-mesh-yingyong-fangan
pingtou-gejiao-ni-yitian-shang-shou-lanya-mesh-yingyong-fangan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g pingtou-gejiao-ni-yitian-shang-shou-lanya-mesh-yingyong-fangan
pingtou-gejiao-ni-yitian-shang-shou-lanya-mesh-yingyong-fangan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
